name: Think & Grow Rich
s_description: A self-help book by Napoleon Hill that outlines 13 principles for achieving success and wealth.

name: Millionaire Fastlane
s_description: A self-help book that ditches slow careers for business strategies to build wealth fast.

name: Rich Dad Poor Dad
s_description: A self-help book by Napoleon Hill that outlines 13 principles for achieving success and wealth.

name: 48 Laws Of Power
s_description: A book by Robert Greene, provides strategic principles for gaining & maintaining power in various situations.

name: How To Win Friends & Influence People
s_description: A book by Dale Carnegie, teaches interpersonal skills for success in both personal & professional relations.

name: Can't Hurt Me
s_description: A book by David Goggins shares his journey overcoming adversity through mental toughness and resilience.

name: Think Straight
s_description: A book by Darius Foroux offers practical advice on achieving mental clarity and focused thinking.

name: Manifest
s_description: A self-help book by Roxie Nafousi that outlines 7 steps to live your best life.

name: The Ikigai
s_description: A book by Hector Garcia & Francesc Miralles explores the Japanese concept of finding life's purpose & joy.

name: Psychology Of Money
s_description: A book by Morgan Housel explores how behavior affects financial decisions and wealth management.

name: Eat That Frog
s_description: A self-help Psychological book by Brian Tracy that states 21 principles for conquering procrastination.

name: Think Like A Monk
s_description: A book by Jay Shetty, provides guidance on finding peace and purpose through monk principles.
